name: Resistor Shoot
description:
Part of a Game Jam 48h challange, this game takes you on a colorful (and a bit difficult) adventure...

Using a resistor color code as inspiration, change your own color to take down the enemies with the same color, but, if an enemy has the same color you soul (the small ball at the center of a bigger ball) has, you loose. If the enemy reaches you, you loose.

Also,  the game has a very colorful background, to mach with the very colorful enemies... adding a bit more chaos.

Good luck to get the best high score!

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D or arrow keys to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left side of mouse to shoot
  • Change colors with the number in your keyboard for your own order of colors, or with the right side of the mouse for an automatic order
